metadata.title: Unblur Image Online | Free AI-Powered Photo Enhancer
metadata.description: Say goodbye to blurry pictures. Use our simple online tool to unblur images, enhance details, and rescue your photos. Fast, free, and no sign-up.

recommendedEffects.heading: Check Out Other Trending Image Effects

questions.question: What is the unblur image effect?
questions.answer: The unblur image effect is an AI-powered image enhancement process. It analyzes a blurry photo to identify and correct issues like motion blur, focus problems, or camera shake, ultimately transforming it into a sharp, clear, and detailed image.

questions.question: How long does it take to unblur an image?
questions.answer: The processing time depends on the complexity and resolution of the image. However, our AI is highly optimized for speed and provides a much faster output compared to our competitors, typically delivering the unblurred image in just a few seconds.

questions.question: Is this unblur image tool free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, it is! All you need to do is sign up for a free account on our website. Upon registration, we will provide you with free credits that you can use to access this tool and unblur your images at no cost.

questions.question: Is it safe to upload my images? What about my privacy?
questions.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. We use secure connections for all uploads, and your images are processed privately. The files are automatically deleted from our servers after a short period, ensuring your data remains safe and confidential.

questions.question: What types of blur can this tool fix?
questions.answer: Our AI tool is effective against various common types of blur, including motion blur (from a moving subject), out-of-focus blur, and blur caused by camera shake. It works best on images where the original details are not completely lost.

questions.question: What image file formats do you support?
questions.answer: We support all major image formats, including JPEG, PNG, and WEBP. For the best results, we recommend uploading the original, highest-quality version of your photo.

questions.question: Will the final image have a watermark?
questions.answer: No, images processed using your free credits or subscription plan are delivered without any watermarks. You get a clean, high-quality image ready for you to use.

howItWorks.heading: How Unblur Image Works
howItWorks.description: Easily fix blurry photos in three simple steps. Upload your image, apply the unblur effect, and download your clear, high-quality result.

steps.title: Upload Photo
bulletPoints: Select & Upload photos from your device to apply the unblur effect, making sure the photos are high quality with a well-lit background.

steps.title: Apply Unblur Image Effect
bulletPoints: After the photo is uploaded, click on the 'Apply Image Effect' button to apply the unblur image effect to your photo.

steps.title: Download & Share
bulletPoints: Download your generated unblurred image to your device and share it on your favorite social media platform, and with your friends and family.
